Html:
Hello Community,
During development with NAudio i was wondering which API is internally used by the WaveIn and WaveOut commands. I suppose its MME. Am I right??

Cheers
Jan

P.S. I'd also appreciate it, if someone of you could provide me some information about the internals of the Windows Audio Stack (especially Win7) I already googled that, but maybe there are better references.
yes it uses MME, There's not a lot out there about Windows audio stack. Read about WASAPI on MSDN is probably your best option
